content: And the bundling stuff is a longer-term project in full effect, still a really big believer there that we have a lot of products that we have made and are in-market that are just -- just due to our release time line over the years, it's just behind another subscription, another subscription, another subscription, whereas if we took these things that are already there and built, put them in the bundles, made them a little bit more accessible from a getting started perspective so that when you're signing up for Squarespace you're signing up for basically, like -- imagine have a business starter kit.
